trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> event when an Update button in the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>-hendelse når en Oppdater-knappen i kontrollen klikkes, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppdateringer oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: (An Update button is a button control whose `CommandName` property is set to "Update".) You can perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of an update operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Oppdater-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der `CommandName` er satt til "Oppdatering".) Når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel kontrollere resultatet av en oppdateringen, kan du utføre en egendefinert rutine.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewUpdatedEventArgs object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of records that were affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: En GridViewUpdatedEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, som gjør det mulig å fastsette antall poster som er berørt og eventuelle unntak som kan ha oppstått.

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records that were affected by the update operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å bestemme antall poster som er berørt av oppdateringen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå om unntak oppstod i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the key field values for the updated record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til nøkkelen feltverdiene for den oppdaterte posten, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the original non-key field values by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til de opprinnelige verdiene for ikke-nøkkelfelt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the updated non-key field values by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til de oppdaterte uten nøkkel feltverdiene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control returns to read-only mode after an update operation.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen returnerer til skrivebeskyttet modus når en oppdateringsoperasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When you handle an exception that occurred during the update operation, you can keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in edit mode by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når du håndtere et unntak som oppstod under oppdateringen, kan du holde i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen i redigeringsmodus ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the GridViewUpdatedEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen GridViewUpdatedEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> object that is contained in the `e` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|Initialized to `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A>|Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>| Verdien for den `affectedRows` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>| <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName>-Objektet som ligger i den `e` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>| Initialisert til `false`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A>| Initialisert til `false`. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når de heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> </xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows that were affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt av oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: The exception that was raised when the update operation was performed.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket oppstod under oppdateringen ble utført.

trans-unit.source: If no exception was raised, use <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen unntak oppstod, bruker du <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> for denne parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows that were affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall rader som er berørt av oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: Because only one record is typically updated, this property usually contains a value of 0 or 1.
trans-unit.target: Fordi bare én post oppdateres vanligvis, inneholder denne egenskapen vanligvis verdien 0 eller 1.

trans-unit.source: An error can occur during the update operation that does not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: Det kan oppstå feil under oppdateringen som ikke utløse et unntak.

trans-unit.source: You can use the AffectedRows property to make sure that a record was updated.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen AffectedRows og kontroller at en post ble oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows that were affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt av oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter unntaket (Hvis noen) som oppstod under oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstod et unntak, og du vil behandle unntaket i tilfelle behandlingsprogram, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the exception is thrown again by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den unntak på nytt ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The exception that was raised during the update operation.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket oppstod under oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: If no exceptions were raised, this property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen unntak oppstod, denne egenskapen returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om et unntak som oppstod under oppdateringen ble behandlet i behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: When an exception is raised during the update operation, use the ExceptionHandled property to indicate whether you handled the exception in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Når det oppstår et unntak under oppdateringen, kan du bruke egenskapen ExceptionHandled som viser om du håndtert unntak i hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not thrown again by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, unntaket regnes håndtert og er ikke et nytt ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the exception is thrown again.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `false`, den unntak på nytt.

trans-unit.source: To determine which exception was raised, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå hvilke unntak oppstod i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> kontrollen skal være i redigeringsmodus etter en oppdateringsoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control returns to read-only mode after an update operation.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen returnerer til skrivebeskyttet modus når en oppdateringsoperasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in edit mode, set the KeepInEditMode property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Vil beholde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere i redigeringsmodus, egenskapen KeepInEditMode til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control will remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen blir værende i redigeringsmodus etter en oppdateringsoperasjon; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the key field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste som inneholder nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par for den oppdaterte posten.

trans-unit.source: Use the Keys property to access the values of the key field for an updated record.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen nøkler for å få tilgang til verdiene i feltet nøkkelen for den oppdaterte posten.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene for å loggføre oppdaterte poster.

trans-unit.source: The Keys property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen nøkler returnerer et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the fields of the updated record.
trans-unit.target: Objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objekter som representerer feltene i den oppdaterte posten.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som en snarvei du kan også bruke indeksering av den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>objekt for å få tilgang til feltet verdier direkte.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: En ordliste for nøkkelfeltet navn/verdi-par for den oppdaterte posten.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste som inneholder de nye feltet Navn/verdi-par for den oppdaterte posten.

trans-unit.source: Use the NewValues property to access the new field values for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen NewValues til å få tilgang til de nye feltverdiene for den oppdaterte posten.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene for å loggføre oppdaterte poster.

trans-unit.source: The NewValues property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen NewValues returnerer et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the fields of the updated record.
trans-unit.target: Objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objekter som representerer feltene i den oppdaterte posten.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som en snarvei du kan også bruke indeksering av den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>objekt for å få tilgang til feltet verdier direkte.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: En ordliste for de nye feltet Navn/verdi-par for den oppdaterte posten.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste som inneholder de opprinnelige feltet Navn/verdi-par for den oppdaterte posten.

trans-unit.source: Use the OldValues property to access the original field values for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: Bruk OldValues-egenskapen for å få tilgang til de opprinnelige feltverdiene for den oppdaterte posten.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene for å loggføre oppdaterte poster.

trans-unit.source: The OldValues property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen OldValues returnerer et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the fields of the updated record with their original values.
trans-unit.target: Objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objekter som representerer feltene i den oppdaterte posten med de opprinnelige verdiene.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som en snarvei du kan også bruke indeksering av den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>objekt for å få tilgang til feltet verdier direkte.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: En ordliste for de opprinnelige feltet Navn/verdi-par for den oppdaterte posten.
